description.value: You know how to make a larger creature hurt when it falls to the ground. If you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] a foe that's larger than you, it takes @Damage[1d8[bludgeoning]] damage (or @Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]] damage on a critical success). If you are master in Athletics, the damage increases to @Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]] damage (or @Damage[4d8[bludgeoning]] damage on a critical success).
